amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Services account by $500,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding (by offset) for the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Services account by $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MN) amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 345 - 76 (Roll no. 183).
